thread.title: Man United launch mega £95m raid for Monaco star Kylian Mbappe
thread.title_full: Man United launch mega £95m raid for Monaco star Kylian Mbappe

title: Man United launch mega £95m raid for Monaco star Kylian Mbappe
text:
Man United launch mega £95m raid for Monaco star Kylian Mbappe MANCHESTER UNITED have reportedly seen a whopping £95m bid for Kylian Mbappe knocked back by Monaco. / Published 22nd March 2017 
The French hitman has risen to the fore with the Ligue 1 outfit this season, firing home 19 goals. 
And his performances at the Stade Louis II have put a host of Europe's top clubs on red alert. 
Manchester United were believed to be chasing Mbappe's compatriot Antoine Griezmann ahead of the summer. 
But it now seems Jose Mourinho may have prioritised signing the Monaco forward instead. 
Spanish radio station Cadena Cope suggest Manchester United have stolen a march on Real Madrid in pursuit of his services. 
And they claim the Red Devils have already made two huge offers, both of which have been rejected. 
Manchester United apparently first registered their interest with a proposal worth £69m. Related articles
